I have configured apache load balancer in front  of tomcat using mod_jk.

I have used mod_jk-1.2.31-httpd-2.2.x.so

I am getting below errors very randomly and no idea why this error poping up even though my tomcats are running fine.

Appreciate your early response and any suggestion to resolve this issue.

(a) this looks like a local problem, not a bug.
(b) mod_jk is a tomcat product, so even if there's a bug it's outside the scope of httpd.
